p: Effects on eggs posture development - In the analysis of eggs posture, NE was able to render the eggs from recent oviposition (two days) unfeasible in a period of 24 h with 100% inhibition for B. straminea, B. tenagophila, and B. glabrata (Ressaca, MG) at both concentrations (47 and 72 ppm) tested ( Table V).
